mermaid:
erDiagram
    users {
        UUID user_id PK
        TEXT user_name
        TIMESTAMP created_at
    }
    sns_master {
        UUID sns_id PK
        TEXT sns_name
        JSONB api_config
    }
    posts {
        UUID post_id PK
        UUID user_id FK
        UUID sns_id FK
        TEXT post_content
        TIMESTAMP post_date
        TEXT status
        TIMESTAMP created_at
    }
    post_schedules {
        UUID schedule_id PK
        UUID post_id FK
        TIMESTAMP scheduled_at
        TIMESTAMP created_at
    }
    users ||--o{ posts : creates
    sns_master ||--o{ posts : belongs_to
    posts ||--o{ post_schedules : has
